### Model Based Clustering

```{r}
mbc <- Mclust(dataScale)
fviz_mclust(mbc, "BIC", palette = "Okabe-Ito")
```

```{r}
summary(mbc$BIC)
```

```{r}
summary(mbc)
```
```{r}
mbc$parameters$pro

mbc$parameters$mean
```



```{r}
fviz_mclust(mbc, "classification", palette = "Okabe-Ito", geom = "point", ellipse.type = "norm", ggtheme = theme_minimal(), labelsize = 0)
```

```{r}
fviz_mclust(mbc, "uncertainty", palette = "Okabe-Ito")
```
